explains: pron. 无论谁（whoever 的宾格）

sentences.en: He was free to marry whomever he chose.
sentences.cn: 他看上了谁就可以和谁结婚。

sentences.en: Take it, or you can give it to whomever (whoever) you like.
sentences.cn: 拿着它，或者你可以把它给什么人都行。

sentences.en: They've been able to hire whomever they want and pay them lower wages.
sentences.cn: 雇主可以挑自己想要的人，并且支付较低的工资。
